Fault.name: MaxeonJobFeedSF2Oracle.bpel
Fault.fix: Use one of the built-in boolean functions from xpath http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#section-Boolean-Functions to convert the return value to boolean
Fault.msg: xpath expression "bpws:getVariableData('RecordsFailed')" used in <case> may not return boolean type value, the xpath engine would automatically try to convert the return value to boolean
